name: TSite Modular GPL
short_description:
TSite Modular(tm) is a dynamic website templating engine designed for PHP / MySQL.
Its principle aim is to accelerate website developments and powerups by providing pre-made modules. Each part of this project is fully customizable. Try it to appreciate
